archimate:Requirement.name: SC.2.1.4c: c) other external suppliers (e.g. Cloud Access Security Brokers (CASBs), Identity as a Service (IDaaS) suppliers or network service providers), such as for providing specific cloud or generic network services.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
